title: Introducing The Netherlands [NATO Atlantic Series] 1950s in color! [A.I. enhanced & colorized]

sources.title: Introducing The Netherlands [NATO Atlantic Series] 1950s in color! [A.I. enhanced & colorized]
sources.description: A highly interesting film about The Netherlands in the mid 1950s as seen from a NATO perspective. The making of the films in this series was funded by the US government as part of the post WW-II Marshall plan. The original film has been motion-stabilized, drastically enhanced and colorized by means of modern video software based on Artificial Intelligence. Source: Archive.org Music: Original soundtrack with American commentary.
